Treatment with desmopressin in severe nocturnal enuresis in childhood.
 A series of 22 patients with severe nocturnal enuresis were treated with desmopressin in a randomised double-blind cross-over study.
 Treatment with 20 and 40 micrograms was highly effective compared with placebo.
 No difference in dry nights was found between the 2 dosages.
 Desmopressin proved to be a safe and effective treatment.
